landingPage.heroSubtitle: The smart booking system that helps service businesses increase bookings by 40%, reduce no-shows, and delight customers with seamless scheduling.
landingPage.whyChooseSubtitle: Real results that impact your bottom line from day one
landingPage.increaseRevenueDesc: Fill more appointment slots with 24/7 online booking. Customers book when it's convenient for them, not just during business hours.
landingPage.saveTimeDesc: Eliminate phone tag and manual scheduling. Automated reminders reduce no-shows by 70%, freeing up your staff for high-value work.
landingPage.smartDecisionsDesc: Real-time analytics show your busiest times, top services, and revenue trends. Optimize staffing and pricing based on data.
landingPage.advancedFeaturesTitle: Advanced Features That Set You Apart
landingPage.advancedFeaturesSubtitle: Sophisticated capabilities that give your business a competitive edge
landingPage.dualCapacityDesc: Unlike other systems, Bookati offers flexible capacity control at both service and employee levels. Set overall service capacity for walk-ins, then fine-tune individual employee workloads. Perfect for salons, clinics, and spas where capacity varies by staff skill level.
landingPage.intelligentAssignmentDesc: Bookati automatically assigns the best available employee based on skills, availability, and workload. Need control? Switch to manual mode for VIP clients or specific requests. The system prevents double-bookings and optimizes employee utilization.
landingPage.servicePackagesDesc: Create unlimited service packages and membership plans. Track usage automatically, handle partial payments, and restore credits on cancellations. Perfect for loyalty programs, monthly memberships, and pre-paid bundles that increase customer lifetime value.
landingPage.flexibleBookingDesc: Book multiple services simultaneously (parallel) for group appointments, or book consecutive slots for extended treatments. The system intelligently manages capacity, prevents conflicts, and ensures optimal resource utilization for every booking type.
landingPage.flexibleBookingBenefit1: Parallel booking for groups and families
landingPage.coreFeaturesSubtitle: Powerful core features included in every plan
landingPage.smartSchedulingDesc: Automatic slot management prevents double-bookings and optimizes your calendar
landingPage.mobileFirstDesc: Stunning booking experience on any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile
landingPage.customerManagementDesc: Track customer history, preferences, and package subscriptions in one place
landingPage.instantNotificationsDesc: Automated SMS and email reminders keep customers informed and reduce no-shows
landingPage.secureReliableDesc: Enterprise-grade security with QR code verification and audit trails
landingPage.businessAnalyticsDesc: Track revenue, popular services, peak times, and employee performance
landingPage.step1Desc: Sign up in 30 seconds. Add your services, staff, and business hours.
landingPage.step2Desc: Brand your booking page with your logo and colors. Share the link with customers.
landingPage.step3Desc: Watch appointments roll in 24/7. Manage everything from your dashboard.
landingPage.testimonialSubtitle: Join hundreds of businesses growing with Bookati
landingPage.testimonial1: Bookati transformed how we manage appointments. We've seen a 45% increase in bookings since switching.
landingPage.testimonial2: The automated reminders alone saved us thousands in lost revenue from no-shows. Game changer!
landingPage.testimonial3: Our staff loves how easy it is to manage schedules. More time for patients, less time on the phone.
landingPage.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of successful service businesses using Bookati to increase revenue and delight customers.
landingPage.ctaFooter: No credit card required • Full feature access • Cancel anytime
landingPage.footerTagline: Empowering service businesses across Saudi Arabia
